comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Police History, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 23103743@N05
23103743@N05
comment._content: See hdl.loc.gov/loc.ndlpcoop/ichicdn.n060955 for a photo of the same group from the Chicago Daily News. That picture was published on August 5, 1913.

comment.author: 8125529@N08
comment._content: The photo of the policewomen in the Library of Congress is something I never since before. I did not think that doing the 1900s women would have a tough and dangerous job as a policewomen. This photo really did surprise me a lot.

comment._content:
swanq:

Thanks for the information. Finding the same photograph over in the Chicago Daily News collection is particularly helpful! We will expand this caption information when we update.

comment._content: Behind the women is a wall of photos of policemen -- presumably former Chicago chiefs of police.
